refnamediv.refpurpose: create a DH structure out of DSA structure

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: DSA_dup_DH() duplicates DSA parameters/keys as DH parameters/keys. q is lost during that conversion, but the resulting DH parameters contain its length.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUE
refsection.para: DSA_dup_DH() returns the new DH structure, and NULL on error. The error codes can be obtained by ERR_get_error 3 .

refsection.title: NOTE
refsection.para: Be careful to avoid small subgroup attacks when using this.
